onBoardingDescTextOne: Everything you need for your natural beauty in one place, carefully curated to bring out the best version of you.
onBoardingMainTextTwo: Choose the care that suits you best.
onBoardingDescTextTwo: Explore a wide range of products designed for your unique needs.
onBoardingDescTextThree: Shop easily and enjoy a unique experience tailored just for you.
shippingPolicyDes:
Orders are processed within 1-2 business days.
Standard shipping takes 3-7 business days depending on your location.
Free shipping for orders over [X amount].
Tracking details will be provided once your order is shipped.
customerSupportDesc:
Our team is here to assist you with any inquiries.
Reach out to us via email or phone from [working hours].
privacyPolicyDesc:
We are committed to protecting your personal information.
Your data will only be used for order processing and improving your shopping experience.
We do not share your information with third parties without your consent.

reviewsDesc: This strawberry body butter is amazing! It smells so fresh and sweet, just like real strawberries. It leaves my skin feeling super soft and hydrated without being greasy. Perfect for everyday use!

productDetailsDesc: Indulge your skin with the creamy goodness of our Strawberry Body Butter, a luxurious blend of hydration and irresistible fragrance. Infused with the sweet scent of fresh strawberries, this body butter will leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and deeply nourished.
